SEARCH
Package org.repinskie.dao.userDAOInterface

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOImpl
public interface UserDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing user-related operations. This interface defines methods for retrieving, saving, and updating user data in the database. By abstracting these operations into an interface, we achieve modularity and flexibility in our codebase, allowing different implementations to be used interchangeably without affecting the rest of the application.

  • Method Details

    • getUserInfo

      User getUserInfo(String username, String surName, String hashPinCode)
      Retrieves user information based on username, surname, and hashed PIN code.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user
      surName - The surname of the user
      hashPinCode - The hashed PIN code of the user
      Returns:
      The user information if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database access

    • saveUser

      void saveUser(User user)
      Saves a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be saved
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database access

    • saveNewPin

      void saveNewPin(String name, String surName, String pinCode)

      Parameters:

      surName - The surname of the user
      pinCode - The new PIN code to be saved
      Throws:
